titleStmt.title: Expedients proposed for the easing and advantaging the coal-trade and lessning the price of coals in London, and other places, &c.
titleStmt.author: Starling, Samuel, Sir, d. 1674.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end of text: Octob. 27. 1670.
Signed at end: Samuel Starling Mayor, ... [and 14 others].
Includes "An answer to the printed paper above-mentioned.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
